Name: Texture Assembler
About the game: Texture Assembler - is a tool for quick and easy manipulation of RGBA image channels. For example, it can be used to convert textures between different engines. It can: - Pack different images into single image channels. - Split image channels into separate images. It can also process a large batch of images with a single click. - Pack textures in bulk and also create your own templates. Supported formats. TGA, BMP, TIFF, JPEG, PNG.
